DOC.criteria: Males female 6585 year old ECOG Performance score 0 1 Body mass index 2230 kg/m2 Body weight > 60 kg Habit consume standard breakfast like toast , bread , butter/margarine , egg , bacon , cereal milk Comply protocol likely compliant prescribe product Renal insufficiency failure screen Current previous positive document history chronic inflammatory state include chronic infection , arthritis , collagen vascular disorder .
